dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hey, are you free to hang out tomorrow?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm free! What do you have in mind?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Let's go hiking in the mountains. It will be so much fun!

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: That sounds amazing! I love hiking. Count me in!

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Great! I'll pick you up at 9 am. Don't forget to bring some snacks and water.

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: No worries, I'll be ready. Can't wait for tomorrow!
